meanings.definition: The concentration of a solution expressed as the total number of solute particles per liter.
meanings.sent1: The osmolarity of the solution was measured to determine its concentration.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use osmolarity to understand how concentrated a solution is.
meanings.sent3: The party was so crowded that the osmolarity of people in the room was high.
meanings.sent4: In the ocean of knowledge, the osmolarity of information can be overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The osmolarity of sugar in the drink made it taste incredibly sweet.
